text:
Underworld don Dawood Ibrahim is the only “Indian national” on a newly updated list of financial sanctions by the United Kingdom, which also includes Sikh terror groups. Dawood, India’s most wanted terrorist against whom an international arrest warrant has been issued, appears on the Treasury Department’s Consolidated List of Financial Sanctions Targets in the U.K., updated on January 27 with four recorded addresses in Pakistan, all in Karachi.

Pakistan addresses

“Dawood Ibrahim Kaskar” is recorded to have lived at House no. 37, 30th Street-defence, Housing Authority, Karachi, Pakistan; House no. 29, Margalla Road, F 6/2 Street no. 22, Karachi, Pakistan; Noorabad, Karachi, Pakistan (palatial bungalow in the hilly area); and White House, Near Saudi Mosque, Clifton, Karachi, Pakistan. The Mumbai-born gangster’s nationality is listed as “Indian”, with a recorded Indian passport which was subsequently revoked by India and then goes on to list a string of Indian and Pakistani passports acquired and misused. — PTI
title: U.K. puts Dawood on assets freeze list
